front.title: Experience from Double Translation and Encapsulation (MAP) Testing

abstract.t: This document discusses the experiences of using Mapping of Address and Port (MAP). Network setup and testing results using MAP-Translation (MAP-T), MAP- Encapsulation (MAP-E) and mixed MAP-T/MAP-E are described in this document. Relationships among native IPv6, single translation, double translation, and encapsulation are also discussed.
